name: Minecraft: Hermitcraft Season 9 Map
summary:
Discover the crafty world of Hermitcraft: Season 9 with this free map. This world was made by a remarkable group of over 25 creators over two years, using only survival mode, in season 9 of Hermitcraft.

There are tons of megabases, minigames, and secrets to explore. Dive into their blocky builds and start your own adventure today!
